long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419:
ğŸ¯ Netflix Subtitle Translator is a tool designed for translating subtitles in Netflix videos. It enhances the original Netflix subtitles by providing bilingual or dual subtitle options.

ğŸŒ Netflix Subtitle Translator is capable of translating the official subtitles/captions of videos hosted on the site netflix.com into almost all widely used languages.

ğŸ›  You have the flexibility to customize the styles of the subtitles. This includes setting styles for bilingual subtitles separately, such as font size, font color, font weight, opacity, background color, and more.

ğŸš  The subtitles are contained within a draggable box, allowing you to adjust their position according to your preference.

ğŸ“‚ Additionally, you can choose to download either the original or translated subtitles. With just one click, the subtitles will be saved to your local file.

ğŸ‘‰ Key Features:
âœ… Display bilingual subtitles
âœ… Support customizable subtitle styles
âœ… Draggable subtitle position
âœ… Download subtitles with one click
âœ… Full-screen support

ğŸ— If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me at support@netflixdualsubtitles.com.

ğŸ›  Anda memiliki fleksibilitas untuk menyesuaikan gaya subtitle. Ini termasuk mengatur gaya untuk subtitle bilingual secara terpisah, seperti ukuran font, warna font, berat font, opacity, warna latar belakang, dan banyak lagi.

ğŸš  Subtitle terdapat dalam kotak yang dapat diseret, memungkinkan Anda menyesuaikan posisinya sesuai preferensi Anda.

ğŸ“‚ Selain itu, Anda dapat memilih untuk mengunduh subtitle asli atau terjemahan. Hanya dengan satu klik, subtitle akan disimpan ke file lokal Anda.

âœ… Menampilkan subtitle bilingual
âœ… Mendukung gaya subtitle yang dapat disesuaikan
âœ… Posisi subtitle yang dapat diseret

âœ… Dukungan layar penuh
